NAME: Vishnu Prakash
ABOUT:
Software engineer with solid 8 years of experience delivering diverse products mostly at Microsoft India. Multi-faceted exposure to Test and Program Manager Roles as well through MACH (Microsoft Academy of College Hires) program. Passionate about technology, quick learner and executor and dependable team player. Passionate about communicating technical ideas clearly and convincingly to customers.
• Have led 6-8 member teams for multiple projects & releases.
• Part of the Accelerated Professional Experience (APEX) Program, a 2-year rotational engineering program at Microsoft focusing on breadth of knowledge and leadership skills. 
• Established and demonstrated skills in Technical Design and Development, Program Management, User Experience and Shipping.
• Worked in various roles and capacity, including Planning, Requirement Documentation, Functional Analysis, etc. in addition to core Design and Development works.

Now turned as a social activist and a full time Art of Living Faculty in North east India. I conduct the Art of Living programs in premier institutions like IIT,IIIT,corporates, et al.
